did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: John W. McConnell Additional Arbitration Files, 1942-1991
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor- Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: John W. McConnell, labor arbitrator, professor of industrial and labor relations, and dean, New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations, Cornell University.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: United States Postal Service -- Officials and employees.
United States Postal Service -- Personnel management.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: John W. McConnell Additional Arbitration Files #5961. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
